item.title: HowTo: Fix iSCSI mounts after reboot
item.description: a follow-up to my previous article on PXE/iSCSI setup, addressing the annoying issue of iSCSI auto-mounting failure

item.title: k8s cluster on Raspberry PI's with iSCSI block storage
item.description: exploring the challenges of running a k8s cluster on Raspberry PI's with PXE network boot and overcoming containerd storage limitations using iSCSI
